name: jamstack-web-starter
description: Minimal boilerplate for new projects built with Eleventy, Tailwind, PurgeCSS and PostCSS

scripts.build: del dist && eleventy && NODE_ENV=production postcss src/_assets/stylesheets/app.css -o src/_includes/app.compiled.css && webpack -p --config webpack.config.js && ELEVENTY_ENV=production eleventy

author: Chris Collins
